name: Island Defender (Chippy)
description:
In Island Defender your goal is to stay alive as long as possible using building to protect yourself from enemies.

Instructions and stuff

===Controls===

Jump: W

Left: A

Right: D

Place Sentry: 1

Place Part Maker: 2

Place Wall: 3

Heal/Place/Upgrade: Left Click

Remove: Right Click

===Machines===

You can place a max of 3 sentries, 3 part makers, and 6 walls.
It takes 100 parts to make and upgrade a sentry, 80 parts to make and upgrade a part maker, and 25 parts to make and upgrade a wall.
You can remove the building to get some metal back.
You can hold a max of 400 parts and part makers can hold a max of 100 parts.

I made this game for the 38th #ludumdare
